Mastering Paper by 53
A Reference Guide

In the spirit of openness I’ve decided to compile everything I’ve learned using Paper by FiftyThree into a multi-part series I’m calling Mastering Paper. As far as I’m concerned Paper doesn’t really need a manual or instruction guide because it’s fairly intuitive to use. So what you’ll find in the following pages are techniques and time savers I’ve developed from creating exclusively with the app over the last year and a half.

Table of Contents

  • Part 1 – Introduction and Tool Guide

    An introduction to Paper's tools and how to exploit them for drawing realistically.

  • Coming Soon Part 5 – Drawing Textures

  • Coming Soon Part 6 – Drawing Realistic Skin Tones

  • Coming Soon Part 7 – Drawing Hair

  • Coming Soon Part 8 – Organizing Palettes and Colors

  • Coming Soon Part 9 – Managing Journals and Pages

  • Coming Soon Part 10 – Book and Printing

  • Coming Soon Part 11 – Screen Capture Techniques and Animation

  • Coming Soon Part 12 – Getting the Most Out of Pencil
